name: Process
declaringWar: You have been marked for termination.
attacked: I tire of your insignificant defiance.
defeated: I have collected enough data. You may return to your lives. For now.
introduction: Behold, mortal, for I am as a god.
neutralHello: A mortal being presumes to speak?
afterPeace: Very well, I shall collate the data from this conflict.
tradeRequest: This exchange shall benefit you. You will accept it.
uniques: Comment [Gain Data instead of combat XP, which is used by unique buildings for extra bonuses]
Comment [Units can still gain XP from other sources like barracks]
